description:
Ocoho`s search for information on Radiant isn`t going well, so Seth makes up his mind to sneak into the castle archive himself. For some reason, even though he`s never been inside the castle before, he feels as if he knows it. He takes a hidden passage he`d seen before in his dreams, and beyond it, he sees a Nemesis and a young man. The young man reacts with fear upon seeing Seth`s horns and traps him within a barrier. While Seth is trapped, every move he makes is matched by a Spectre Nemesis somewhere in the world outside...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ka no Mono no Na wa: Diabal
Le nom de cet homme: Diabel
